txt.en: Medwine wants you to deal a final blow against the brigands of Parth Celebrant.

'I have one last task for you, [placeholder].

'Even with the assault we have levied against these Men, they remain entrenched, and we cannot drive them out completely.

'Perhaps if their torches were used against them, we would be able to run them off our land for good. Travel south to their camp and burn them out.'
The brigand-camp is to the south of Idmar's camp along the banks of the Limlight River.\n\nMedwine has asked you to burn down the brigand-camp.
'It is done? Excellent. With so much of their camp burned to the ground, it should be very difficult for them to recover. You have done my people a great service this day.'
Medwine is at Idmar's camp in central Parth Celebrant.\n\nYou should return to Medwine wih news of your success.
'If you burn the brigands' camp to the ground, they will have no recourse but to find new shelter.'
